pullrequest.title: PresetManager Part 2: command line, SDF generation, unit test

content.raw:
This branch has trouble casting from `sdf::Vector3` to `gazebo::math::Vector3`:
~~~
[Err] [PhysicsEngine.cc:234] Caught bad any_cast in PhysicsEngine::SetParam: boost::bad_any_cast: failed conversion using boost::any_cast
[Wrn] [PresetManager.cc:78] Couldn't set parameter [gravity] in physics engine
[Err] [PhysicsEngine.cc:234] Caught bad any_cast in PhysicsEngine::SetParam: boost::bad_any_cast: failed conversion using boost::any_cast
[Wrn] [PresetManager.cc:78] Couldn't set parameter [magnetic_field] in physics engine
~~~
content.html:
This branch has trouble casting from sdf::Vector3 to gazebo::math::Vector3:

[Err] [PhysicsEngine.cc:234] Caught bad any_cast in PhysicsEngine::SetParam: boost::bad_any_cast: failed conversion using boost::any_cast
[Wrn] [PresetManager.cc:78] Couldn't set parameter [gravity] in physics engine
[Err] [PhysicsEngine.cc:234] Caught bad any_cast in PhysicsEngine::SetParam: boost::bad_any_cast: failed conversion using boost::any_cast
[Wrn] [PresetManager.cc:78] Couldn't set parameter [magnetic_field] in physics engine
